description_carte: A cunning fox demon, wreathed in hellfire, delights in toying with mortals' desires. Beware her illusions!
description_visuelle: Anime style, nine-tailed fox demon. Fiery red fur with black markings, piercing yellow eyes. Wearing ornate gold jewelry. Background: A burning, desolate landscape with twisted trees and swirling embers.

skills.name: Foxfire Frenzy
skills.description: Unleashes a barrage of fireballs, burning the target and dealing damage over time.

skills.name: Illusionary Shift
skills.description: Teleports to a random location, increasing evasion chance for 2 turns.

skills.name: Whispers of Temptation
skills.description: Charms the target, reducing their attack and defense for 1 turn.

skills.name: Infernal Tail Sweep (ULTIMATE)
skills.description: Summons all nine tails to strike, dealing massive fire damage to all enemies.
